alert.note: Alert for Sheep Range; Spring Mountains-Red Rock Canyon (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued January 08 at 1:14AM PST until January 10 at 10:00PM PST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH TUESDAY EVENING ABOVE 7000 FEET... * WHAT...Light snow accumulations start Monday night with heavy snow possible above 7000 feet Tuesday. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 12 inches possible. Winds could gust as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Sheep Range and Spring Mountains. * WHEN...From Monday afternoon through Tuesday evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Watch means there is potential for significant snow accumulations that may impact travel. Continue to monitor the latest forecasts.

area.areaDesc: Sheep Range; Spring Mountains-Red Rock Canyon
